2. The white stripe that runs diagonally on the furthest side from the flagpole should be thinner on the side on top of the red stripe.
幅米字旗係咪啱，旗桿位（flagpole)係有份定；呢張旗桿位在左，啱；林約希嗰張旗桿位在右，錯。
